amendment.description: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to repeal the Medicare outpatient rehabilitation therapy caps.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1024 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1024 proposed by Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S8521-8522; text: CR S8521) To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to repeal the Medicare outpatient rehabilitation therapy caps.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1024 proposed by Senator Ensign.
